channel.title: The complete list of tech terms starting with the letter 'I' on Tech Terminologies
channel.description: Recent content in The complete list of tech terms starting with the letter 'I' on Tech Terminologies

item.title: What is an Installer?
item.description: An installer is a software application that is used to install, update, and configure a computer program or software package.

item.title: What is IT Healthcare?
item.description: Information technology (IT) in healthcare refers to the use of computers, software, and other digital tools to manage and process information in the healthcare industry.

item.title: What is ICT (Information and Communications Technology)?
item.description: Information and communications technology, or ICT, refers to the various technologies and tools used to facilitate the exchange of information and communication.

item.title: What is Image Scaling?
item.description: Image scaling refers to the process of resizing an image. This can be done for a variety of reasons, such as to fit an image into a specific space on a webpage or to reduce the file size of an image to make it easier to upload or download.
